com.cba.simulator.controller

Class SimulatorExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cba.simulator.controller.SimulatorExecutor

  • public class SimulatorExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for the following,
    • Prepare historical environment data.
    • Predicts future weather conditions per location from historical data.
    • Prepare output content.
    • Writes prepared content to output file..
    Author:
    Gills Antony

    • Method Detail

      • simulateEnvironmentConditions

        public void simulateEnvironmentConditions(java.util.List<EnvironmentDetailsDO> environmentDataList,
                                          SimulatorInputDTO simulatorInputDTO)
                                   throws UtilsException
        Method to simulate future environment conditions from historical data.

        This method does the following, Prepare historical data per location Predicts output from historical data Write output to text file.

        Parameters:
        environmentDataList - - contains list of historical environment details of different locations.
        simulatorInputDTO - - arguments passed as input.
        Throws:
        UtilsException - if any Util operations fails.

      • simulateConditionsPerLocation

        public java.util.List<SimulatorOutputDTO> simulateConditionsPerLocation(EnvironmentDetailsDO environmentData,
                                                                        SimulatorInputDTO simulatorInputDTO)
        Method to simulate future environment conditions per location from historical data.

        This method does the following, Prepare historical data for each location Predicts output from historical data.

        Parameters:
        environmentData - - contains historical environment details of one location.
        simulatorInputDTO - - arguments passed as input.
        Returns:
        list of simulator output

      • prepareEnvironmentData

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<WeatherDetailsDO>> prepareEnvironmentData(java.util.List<WeatherDetailsDO> weatherDetailsList)
        Creates a map with key as day of year and value as list of weather details.
        Parameters:
        weatherDetailsList - - contains list of weather details of one location.
        Returns:
        map with day of year(key) and list of weather details(value).

      • prepareOutputDO

        public SimulatorOutputDTO prepareOutputDO(EnvironmentDetailsDO environmentData,
                                          int dayOfYearForPrediction,
                                          SimulatorInputDTO simulatorInputDTO)
        Insert details to output object.
        Parameters:
        environmentData - - output environment details of a day for the location.
        dayOfYearForPrediction - - the day for which prediction is done.
        simulatorInputDTO - - arguments passed as input.
        Returns:
        predicted output environment details of particular location for one day.
